definition: loved by all/to have universal appeal
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: I thought everyone who met her loved her.
The puppy is hard to resist .
sentences.chinese: 這隻小狗真是人見人愛。

sentences.english: Such a girl is loved by everybody.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的一個女孩子人見人愛。

sentences.english: Who is this cute bear that so many people adore?He goes by the name of Teddy.
sentences.chinese: 它就是人見人愛，得意可愛的小熊是何方神聖？

sentences.english: She's hard to resist, don't you just love her?
sentences.chinese: 真是人見人愛，你能說你不喜歡？

sentences.english: She is such a nice girl that everyone loves her.
sentences.chinese: 她是一個人見人愛的好姑娘。
